content: Set up the initial project repository with React and established our Git workflow. Created the base component structure and routing system.
Finalized the design system with our color palette, typography, and component styles. Created wireframes for all main views and shared with the team for feedback.
Implemented the database schema and set up the initial API endpoints. Created documentation for the backend architecture to share with the team.
Built the first set of reusable components including buttons, cards, and form elements. Added Storybook documentation for the component library.
Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions. Configured staging environment and automated deployment process for smoother workflow.
Implemented user authentication flow with protected routes. Added session management and user context across the application.
Refined the responsive design for mobile devices. Created animation prototypes for key user interactions to enhance UX.
Optimized database queries for improved performance. Implemented caching layer to reduce API response times.
Integrated state management with Redux for complex application state. Created custom hooks for common functionality.
Set up monitoring and logging infrastructure. Implemented error tracking to quickly identify and fix production issues.
